entry.title: Personal Resume
entry.content:
Information

  • Name: Ho Wing Sze

Contact Information

  • Email: h0321_777@qq.com / hysssws@gmail.com
  • Tele: 13054416723
  • Wechat: xh_hys

Educational Background

  • Jinan University, 2022.09-Present
    • Year 3 undergraduate in Journalism
    • Major: English, Communication, Social Science, Journalism History
    • Top 10% in Major GPA Ranking

Skills

  • Proficient in Excel, Word, and media tools (Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Aegisub, Blender)
  • Strong teamwork spirit, resilience under pressure, and keen attention to detail

Personal Qualities

  • Serious and dedicated in work
  • Team player, resilient under pressure
  • Possess keen observational skills

Internship Experience

GS Data

Daily News Editor Intern

  • 2024.10 â€“ 2025.01
    • Edited, organized, and reported public opinion content
    • Conducted data processing and analysis using standard office software
    • Developed public opinion service strategies based on client needs

Extracurricular Activities

Integrated Media Center, School of Journalism and Communication , JNU

Overseas Platform Operations Department Officer

  • 2024.10-Present
    • Responsible for the multimedia external communication content of School of Journalism and Communication
    • Conduct promotion planning for culture-related columns

Truth Seeker Studio

Operations Department Director

  • 2024.09-Present
    • Oversaw daily operations and management of the studioâ€™s domestic and international media matrix
    • Collaborated with GDToday on the â€œFact Checkâ€ project, achieving 300+ overseas and 1,000+ domestic coverage
    • Partnered with Southern English Network on the â€œProbe Series,â€ reaching 1,000+ overseas audiences
    • Organized team-building events and recruitment activities

HKSAC

Publicity Department Officer

  • 2022.09-2023.09
    • Responsible for writing and editing social media posts, focusing on trending topics to ensure the posts are engaging and meet audience needs
    • Assisted in coordinating on-site activities and documenting event details

Personal Honors

  • CET6 (573)
  • National Mandarin Test (Level 2; Grade A)
  • First prize, Excellent Student Scholarship

Campus Experience

Student Community

Dormitory Administrator

  • 2022.09-Present
    • Assisted with dormitory visits to understand residential needs
    • Coordinated with student community living situations
    • Participated in volunteer work during the epidemic, coordinated meal supplies to ensure the quality of student life
    • Constantly cared for student mental well-being and stabilized student emotions
